title: Gifted Child

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Predict a player's allegiance at night.
- Choose to don a bulletproof vest at night to grant yourself Basic defense. (2 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Choose a player and give a guess at what their faction is. If you are correct, your streak raises by one. If you are incorrect, the streak resets.
- Your results are not affected by any abilities that alter investigative results.
- You may no longer use your first ability once you have won.
- You may not predict your own alignment.
